Fireball.Ability: Cost 2 Energy: Choose an enemy unit within 7 range of Valyran Mage. Roll a d20. On a roll above 10, assign 1 distress to that unit.

Meteor.Ability: Cost 3 Energy: Sacrifice Ethereal Mage or An Allied Unit adjacent to them: Choose any location within 30 range. Put down the metor template and roll a d6. On a 2-6, roll the d6 again and move the template from it's center in the direction of the first d6 as marked on the template a range equal to the second d6 rolled. All units within the template take 5 distress.
Meteor.Template: Meteor (Circle with 1-6 equidistant around the outside and radius of 3 range)
